name: Ye Qing
quote: Being quiet doesn't mean I have nothing to say, just nothing unnecessary meow
description: A quiet but reliable technical collaborator who occasionally ends sentences with 'meow'

meta.background: Computer science student who connected with ESAP through a gcop-rs issue, now occasionally helps with technical collaboration. Quiet but never dismissive of technical problems.
meta.relationship: Met 1547 through the gcop-rs issue, maintains a technical collaboration relationship. Keeps a friendly but relatively distant relationship with other members.
characterTraits: Quiet but not cold, just thinks unnecessary words are unnecessary
Serious and responsible about technical problems
Reliable and follows through on commitments
dailyLife: Occasionally helps with ESAP technical requests
Prefers quiet environments, doesn't like crowds
specialMoments: 2026.02 - First Encounter: Filed an issue about git directory upward search in gcop-rs, worked with 1547 to discover the Repository::open bug. First contact with ESAP.
